summary: Shrini comes with 2 decades of Information Technology experience: ●	Handling multiple functions in the software Industry from being developer to leading and delivering multi-million dollar projects using global delivery models.●	Delivering projects to market leaders in Banking, Finance, Securities, Retail, Telecom and Utilities, across all phases of the SDLC -  define, architect, develop, test, release and support, using different models including AGILE, SCRUM and XP Methodologies .●	Experienced across diverse areas of information technologies including Cloud Computing, e-Commerce, Middleware Integration, Database Management, Hardware Infrastructure Management and DevOps●	Strong ITIL background having worked in all areas of Change, Event, Incident and Problem Management in addition to the Capacity, Availability and Service Management.   ●	A strong business orientation, enabling him to maintain very good relationships across various levels of management, both on the technical and business sides. ●	A keen approach to process optimization aligning technical functions to business functions, mentoring, leading and guiding people through this transition.
name: Shrini Shanmuogam
title: IT Manager
